item.title: Welcome to Tech Samskruthi
item.description: Welcome to Tech Samskruthi platform! We talk about Technology, Startups, Venture Capital, Gaming and everything in between! All in Kannada. Please stay tuned!

Tech Samskruthi is a platform created by Shashank Kumar Shankar and Nithin Kashyap where they talk about technology, startups, venture capital and other fun stuff in a language called Kannada native to state of Karnataka, India. More about Shashank Shashank works in Silicon Valley, California in one of the FAANG companies. His domain expertise is around building cloud / AI platforms. More about Nithin Nithin works in Las Vegas, Nevada in a company which validates autonomous vehicle technology.
